Title: American Relief Agency - Report on American relief work. 12
Notes: Part of the work of the Relief Agency is to make 6,500 beds available to sick people, free of charge. American relief has been used to build and renovate hospitals and medical stations, and to procure and transport medical supplies. The new hospital construction on the image will be for exclusive use of mental patients.Nr. 12 of the poster set on the Economic Aid Agreement between the United States of America and the Republic of China (3 July 1948).
